1 and 2

2000000000000000000000

ERC20._mint(recipient, Uint256(2000000000000000000000, 0));

protostar declare ./build/ex01.json --network testnet --account-address 0x052E6AD8187767eF41F2F3bc225D33d31B37DD9BBEE7B628F4b6b16b90D293EC --max-fee auto --private-key-path ./.env

protostar deploy 0x07f2f9c409756dfa9bdaefc04a387ab4316df8b4890827a73cb486656ccf5c46 --network testnet --account-address 0x052E6AD8187767eF41F2F3bc225D33d31B37DD9BBEE7B628F4b6b16b90D293EC --max-fee auto --private-key-path ./.env --inputs 2343576618933993302415733561709464540131434012961226624765960147118779962348 2343576618933993302415733561709464540131434012961226624765960147118779962348

python3 -i utils.py
